source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002800_CHAINUZZ<tab>Who <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you people!? And how did you come to have so many <var 1A 02 /var>friends<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002800_CHAINUZZ<tab>Wie kann es sein, dass ihr so viele Freunde habt? Wer seid ihr?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>The saviors of the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wir sind gekommen, um diese Welt zu retten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Adventurers of no import.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wir sind nur einfache Reisende.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>The artist Alphinaud and his assistants.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Nichts weiter, nur ein Maler und seine Gehilfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002810_CHAINUZZ<tab>Saviors of the world? Are you being serious? Oh gods, you are...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002810_CHAINUZZ<tab>Gekommen, um diese Welt zu retten<var 1D /var>...? Ist das dein Ernst?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002820_CHAINUZZ<tab>No import? You expect me to believe that after you just promised me the help of the better part of the world!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002820_CHAINUZZ<tab>Einfache Reisende? Die könnten doch niemals so viel bewirken! Das glaube ich nicht<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002830_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh, dearest, have you forgotten already? Alphinaud told us that when we first met.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002830_DULIACHAI<tab>Hast du das denn vergessen? Sie haben sich uns doch vorgestellt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002840_CHAINUZZ<tab>Um, actually, that may not have been... Never mind...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002840_CHAINUZZ<tab>Ja aber ... Sie sind doch nicht wirklich<var 1D /var>... Ach, schon gut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002850_YSHTOLA<tab>So, as you can see, you will not want for bodies. I trust you will have your design ready in good time for their arrival.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002850_YSHTOLA<tab>An Helfern wird es dir also nicht mangeln. Machst du dich dann schon mal an die Planung des Talos?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002860_YSHTOLA<tab>Norvrandt is counting on you...heir to Daedalus Stoneworks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002860_YSHTOLA<tab>Wir zählen auf dich, Meister der großen Daedalus-Steinhauerei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002870_RYNE<tab>We'll be back as soon as we can─and we'll bring the whole world with us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002870_RYNE<tab>Wir sind ganz bald wieder hier, mit der Verstärkung. Bis dann!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...I take it we will be assisting Master Chai. Though I am quite sure he has everything under control...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dann bleiben wohl nur wir beide, um dem <var 1A 02 /var>Meister<var 1A 01 /var> bei der Planung zu assistieren<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The future is where my destiny awaits...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Mein Schicksal erwartet mich in der Zukunft<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(GASP)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ha!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Forgive me, I was...lost in a dream.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Entschuldige, ich muss noch geschlafen haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I needed some fresh air, and thought to rest for a moment. It would seem I am more fatigued than I realized.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich wollte nur kurz eine Pause machen, dabei muss ich wohl eingenickt sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Too much time away from the tower, I fear. It drains me─leaves my body frail and weak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Du weißt ja, die Entfernung zum Kristallturm zehrt an meinen Kräften.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though, in truth, it is debatable whether I can still call this my body...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich bin mit ihm verbunden. Mit Leib und Leben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>When first I turned my mind towards the salvation of the world, I came to the conclusion that it would take many long years. Many more than remained to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Es war ganz am Anfang, bevor Crystarium überhaupt gegründet wurde<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And so I made myself one with the Crystal Tower, that I might live indefinitely.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Als ich überlegte, wie diese Welt zu retten sei, wurde mir schnell klar, dass ich dafür mehr Zeit benötigte, als mir noch verblieb.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am but an extension of it now. Hence my weakness the farther I travel, and the longer I am away.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Deshalb machte ich mich zu einem Teil des Kristallturms und erlangte so ein ewiges Leben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It has been quite a journey.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Was für eine lange Reise<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But thanks to you, the end is in sight. My wish will finally be fulfilled.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Aber bald ist es vollbracht, dank dir. Bald wird mein Wunsch in Erfüllung gehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>How goes the construction effort?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wie gehen die Arbeiten am Talos voran?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then this may be the last moment we have to ourselves for a while. Come, sit with me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dies könnte der letzte Moment der Ruhe sein. Vielleicht eine gute Gelegenheit, sich mal über andere Dinge zu unterhalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tell me, when all of this is over, what will you do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Verrate mir. Was hast du vor, wenn das hier alles vorbei ist?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll settle matters with the Empire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich habe noch eine Rechnung mit dem Garleischen Kaiserreich offen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What I always do: seek out mightier foes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Dann werde ich mir noch stärkere Gegner suchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Rest awhile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich glaub, ich habe mir erstmal eine Pause verdient.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tja<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, yes. Even should we succeed in forestalling the Eighth Umbral Calamity, the specter of war will remain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ja, selbst wenn wir die Achte Katastrophe verhindern, bedeutet das nicht das Ende des Krieges.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But to declare your intent with such easy resolve... You truly are a heroes' hero, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich bin immer wieder davon beeindruckt, wie entschlossen du dich deinen Heraus<var 16 /var>forde<var 16 /var>rungen stellst. Du bist für mich der Inbegriff <var 08 E905 ((einer Heldin)) ((eines Helden)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In the hundred years they have existed, no one had come close to ridding us of even a <var 1A 02 /var>single<var 1A 01 /var> Lightwarden. Yet already you yearn for the next challenge. You truly are a world apart from us all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Noch stärkere? In einhundert Jahren konnte es niemand mit den Licht<var 16 /var>bringern aufnehmen. Dein Heldenmut sucht wirklich seinesgleichen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That would be well deserved. You might consider roaming Norvrandt not as her savior, but as a simple sightseer. Viewed through such eyes, I am certain she would seem quite different.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ja, das hast du. Sobald Norvrandt gerettet ist, solltest du es bereisen und von einer neuen Seite kennenlernen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Well, you needn't hurry to decide. I was merely curious to know what sort of future lay in store for a hero with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> life ahead of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Na, es eilt ja nicht. Das kannst du dir dann immer noch überlegen. Ich war einfach nur neugierig.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But whatever it is you decide to do, I have every confidence that you will do well. For you have the strength to forge your own path.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich hab ein gutes Gefühl, was deine Zukunft angeht. Du hast die Kraft, dein eigenes Schicksal zu bestimmen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You will leave countless lives better than you found them, and the souls you touch will never forget your kindness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Du hast so viele gerettet. Sie werden dich für immer in ihren Herzen behalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then, in trying times, when you question your worth and your choices, they will raise their voices to remind you of the difference you have made.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sie werden für dich da sein. Sie werden sich an deine Güte erinnern, wenn du selbst einmal in Schwie<var 16 /var>rig<var 16 /var>keiten gerätst und an dir zweifelst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And thus will your deeds come to affirm your path. Remember this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Gutes bewirkt Gutes. Auch die selbstloseste Hilfe nützt uns am Ende selbst. Davon bin ich fest überzeugt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> do when this is over?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was hast du denn vor, wenn das hier vorbei ist?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I would know more of you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wollen wir zur Abwechslung mal über deine Zukunft reden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>When this is over... Indeed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wenn es vorbei ist, sagst du<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Of <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? You mean what I intend to do afterwards?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Meine Zukunft<var 1D /var>...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I once told you that there are things we can ill afford to lose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich habe dir gesagt, dass es jemanden gibt, den ich retten möchte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>"Things,“ I said, though in truth I spoke of a person. One who is unaware of the full extent of my plans. Though he deserves to know, I have good reason to keep my counsel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich brenne darauf, ihm alles zu erklären, aber aus ganz bestimmten Gründen kann ich mich ihm nicht offenbaren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>“Things,” I said, though in truth I spoke of a person. One who is unaware of the full extent of my plans. Though she deserves to know, I have good reason to keep my counsel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich brenne darauf, ihr alles zu erklären, aber aus ganz bestimmten Gründen kann ich mich ihr nicht offenbaren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I have come to terms with this in my mind, yet my heart yearns to lay everything bare. For <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is my inspiration, and I would give much and more for the chance to speak with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> as friends, with no thought of concealment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich habe mich damit abgefunden, dass es unmöglich ist, aber<var 1D /var>... Was würde ich nur darum geben, mit <var 08 E905 ((ihr)) ((ihm)) /var> offen reden zu können, als gute Freunde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003180_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Should <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> indulge me with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> tales, I would regale <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> with my own─about my efforts in Norvrandt, perhaps.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003180_MYSTERYVOICE<tab><var 08 E905 ((Sie würde mir von ihren)) ((Er würde mir von seinen)) /var> Reisen erzählen, und ich würde <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((ihn)) /var> vielleicht mit Geschichten meiner eigenen Abenteuer hier in Norvrandt <var 08 E905 ((unterhalten)) ((vergnügen)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though...ultimately, that tale is more yours than it is mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ha, wobei diese Geschichten letztendlich mehr von dir handeln würden als von mir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then...I would ask <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> about <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> next adventure. And if <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> should wish me to be a part of it, oh...how happy it would make me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Und danach würden wir uns aufmachen, auf unser nächstes Abenteuer<var 1D /var>... zusammen. Wie glücklich mich das machen würde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Together, we would travel the lands and cross the seas and take to the skies upon the eternal wind... My heart swells simply to imagine it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wir würden neue Lande erkunden, Meere überqueren und auf den ewigen Winden zu neuen Horizonten aufbrechen. Das ist mein Traum!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But all of this is contingent upon our victory in the coming battle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Doch zuerst haben wir noch einen Kampf zu gewinnen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The people of this world have entrusted their hopes to us. We cannot fail them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Die Bewohner dieser Welt zählen auf uns. Wir dürfen sie nicht enttäuschen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Nor those who roused me from my slumber.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Genau wie diejenigen, die mich aus meinem Schlaf erweckten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank you for your company, my friend. Let us return to Amity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Danke für die schöne Unterhaltung. Das war eine willkommene Ablenkung in dieser Zeit der Sorgen. Aber jetzt<var 1D /var>... zurück zu den Aufgaben, die vor uns liegen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003260_YSHTOLA<tab>Word from the Exarch. All is set on his side, and we may proceed when ready.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003260_YSHTOLA<tab>Der Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch hat sich gemeldet. Bei ihm ist alles bereit. Es kann jederzeit losgehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003270_THANCRED<tab>Well, we have sufficient stone for our needs.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003270_THANCRED<tab>Wir haben mehr als genug Steine herbeigeschafft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003280_URIANGER<tab>Likewise, preparations for the imbuing have been made according to thine exacting instructions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003280_URIANGER<tab>Das Ritual zur Einspeisung der magischen Energie ist ebenfalls vorbereitet, genau nach Anweisung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then you need only say the word!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dann kann es ja losgehen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003300_YSHTOLA<tab>Let us begin. See that everyone is in position.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003300_YSHTOLA<tab>Wir aktivieren jetzt den Talos. Auf eure Plätze!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003310_YSHTOLA<tab>We shall catch Vauthry, mountain and all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003310_YSHTOLA<tab>Greifen wir uns den Berg und Vauthry gleich mit dazu!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003320_CHAINUZZ<tab>Here it comes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003320_CHAINUZZ<tab>Die Stunde der Wahrheit<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003330_CHAINUZZ<tab>Hah hah! Yes! <var 1A 02 /var>Yes<var 1A 01 /var>! You've not lost your touch, you clever old bugger!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003330_CHAINUZZ<tab>Jaa! So ist's gut! Er lebt, er lebt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003340_CHAINUZZ<tab>Do you see what they're doing!? If its hands are damaged, it won't be able to cling to the mountain! Oh, I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> this was a terrible idea!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003340_CHAINUZZ<tab>Oh nein! Sie haben es auf seine Hände abgesehen! Ohne sie kann er sich nicht mehr an dem Berg festhalten!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vauthry marshals the eaters to his defense. This was only to be expected.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Verdammt! Wir hätten wissen müssen, dass Vauthry nicht so leicht aufgibt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>We must try and draw as many of them down to the ground as possible. It may not be enough, but we have no other choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wir müssen versuchen, möglichst viele von ihnen auf den Boden zu locken. Vielleicht ist es vergeblich, aber uns bleibt keine Wahl.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003370_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Is that─?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003370_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Was kommt denn da?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003380_FEOUL<tab>Such a heartless thing our sapling is! Cold and cruel and <var 1A 02 /var>heartless<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003380_FEOUL<tab>Wie kannst du nur so herzlos sein, mein Baum des Glanzes! Herzlos und unverschämt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003390_FEOUL<tab>Summon us in times of need, we <var 1A 02 /var>expressly<var 1A 01 /var> said─yet what should we find but the final battle joined without so much as a <var 1A 02 /var>whisper<var 1A 01 /var> of our name!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003390_FEOUL<tab>Da hatte ich dir extra unsere Hilfe angeboten, und jetzt willst du kämpfen, ohne uns zu rufen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003400_FEOUL<tab>Yes, yes, we may also have said that we fae folk have no interest in the struggles of men─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003400_FEOUL<tab>Ich weiß, ich weiß, ich hab gesagt, wir würden uns nicht einmischen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003410_FEOUL<tab>But if our <var 1A 02 /var>adorable<var 1A 01 /var> sapling had come crying to us for help, we would of <var 1A 02 /var>course<var 1A 01 /var> have flown to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> aid! Of course we would! What are we to do with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003410_FEOUL<tab>Aber das gilt doch nicht, wenn mein liebes Bäumchen in Gefahr ist! <var 1A 02 /var>Ich<var 1A 01 /var> bin nicht so kaltherzig!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003420_FEOUL<tab>We are so very, very sad. <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> will play with us. <var 1A 02 /var>Cheer us up again<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003420_FEOUL<tab>Seht ihr, wie traurig ich bin? Kommt, spielt mit mir und heitert mich auf!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Thank you, Feo Ul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Du bist die Beste<var 1D /var>... Titania.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I think they're mad at me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ui, da ist aber jemand sauer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This I did not expect. But I will gladly accept the help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Eine unverhoffte, aber willkommene Hilfe. Der Feenkönig wird die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger für eine Weile beschäftigen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I will send word to Y'shtola and the others. Join them at the foot of Mt. Gulg and be ready to make the ascent!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich sage Y'shtola und den anderen Bescheid. Triff sie am Fuße des Berges und beginnt euren Aufstieg!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003450_ALPHINAUD<tab>The end is near, my friends. We have found Vauthry's hiding place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003450_ALPHINAUD<tab>Da. Da oben muss sich Vauthry verschanzt haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003460_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Unrepentant villains. Will you not be satisfied until you have brought disaster down upon your own heads?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003460_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Himmlische Stimme-)Elende Störenfriede! Warum sehnt ihr euch so sehr nach dem Tod? Ihr findet darin doch keine Erlösung!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003470_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)By your wickedness, you stand to gain naught but ceaseless conflict!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003470_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Himmlische Stimme-)Wollt ihr ewig Kriege für das Leben führen? Erkennt ihr nicht den Wahnsinn?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003480_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Had you only entrusted your fate to me, there would have been peace for all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003480_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Himmlische Stimme-)Unterwerft euch, und ich erlöse euch von allem Streit, allem Elend.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003490_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)You could have lived in bliss in my eternal paradise, free from the burdens of conscience and purpose!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003490_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Himmlische Stimme-)Es gibt keinen tieferen Sinn, kein Gut, kein Böse. Es gibt nur Frieden, und zwar in meinem Paradies!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Peace assumes many forms, and I do not doubt that you considered yours well worth the cost. I was even prepared to believe that the end might justify the means.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vielleicht meinst du es ernst. Vielleicht herrscht dort wirklich eine Art von Frieden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ignorant as I was, I had hoped that you might mend your ways and join hands with us. That we might strive together for the happiness of all...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Weil ich noch eine Chance sah, dass dir auf irgendeine Weise das Glück deiner Untertanen doch etwas bedeutet, war ich bereit, dich zu verschonen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003520_ALPHINAUD<tab>...But no more. Your actions cannot be reconciled with your words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aber das ist jetzt vorbei. Deine abscheulichen Taten haben dich verraten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003530_ALPHINAUD<tab>"Peace for all,“ you say, yet when you were threatened, your first act was to sacrifice your own people in order to save yourself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Kaum warst du in Gefahr, hast du die Bürger Eulmores zurückgelassen und bist geflohen, um dir ein neues Paradies zu schaffen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003540_ALPHINAUD<tab>If your paradise can be rebuilt so long as you alone survive, it exists not for the people. It exists solely for your twisted pleasure!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003540_ALPHINAUD<tab>Für wen ist denn dein sogenanntes Paradies? Für deine Untertanen, die du verraten hast, oder ist es doch nur eine Spielwiese für deine Eitelkeit?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003550_RYNE<tab>Hear me, Vauthry. The people won't submit to your will. For we each have our own.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003550_RYNE<tab>Lord Vauthry. Diese Welt wird sich niemals deinem Willen unterwerfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003560_RYNE<tab>I made a promise to a noble soul─a woman who saw fit to entrust me with her legacy─and I mean to keep it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003560_RYNE<tab>Ein gutes Mädchen mit einem großen Herzen hat mir die Zukunft dieser Welt anvertraut, und ich habe ihr versprochen, sie mit all meiner Kraft zu behüten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003570_RYNE<tab>Everyone who stands with us has something precious, something that they cherish and would die to protect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003570_RYNE<tab>Ich weiß noch nicht viel über die Welt, aber ich sehe, dass jeder, sei es Mann, Frau oder Kind, etwas in sich trägt, das ihn zu etwas Besonderem macht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003580_RYNE<tab>They know their own hearts. They know what they want for this world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003580_RYNE<tab>Keiner von ihnen hat es jetzt mehr nötig, sich in dein falsches Paradies zu flüchten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003590_RYNE<tab>And by lending their strength to our cause, they have spoken!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003590_RYNE<tab>Sie haben keine Angst mehr, weil sie gesehen haben, dass sie eine Zukunft haben. Eine, die sie selbst errichten!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003600_RYNE<tab>No matter how hard you may try to bend the world to your will, we will never yield!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003600_RYNE<tab>Du kannst noch so sehr wüten und toben, aber in Wirklichkeit haben sie dich bereits vergessen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003610_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)<var 1A 02 /var>Silence<var 1A 01 /var>! Not another word!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003610_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Himmlische Stimme-)Ruhe! RUUUHEEE! Wie könnt ihr es wagen, so mit mir zu sprechen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003620_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)You presume to lecture me? Insolent worms! You will learn your place!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003620_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Himmlische Stimme-)<var 1A 02 /var>Ihr<var 1A 01 /var> wollt <var 1A 02 /var>mir<var 1A 01 /var> etwas über diese Welt erzählen? Was bildet ihr euch ein!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003630_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)With my true powers awakened, I will expunge you like the filth you are. Your demise will serve as a reminder to all─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003630_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Himmlische Stimme-)Jetzt, da meine wahre Macht erwacht ist, werde ich euch auslöschen! Eure gereinigten Knochen werden allen anderen Störenfrieden eine Warnung sein!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003640_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)That <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> am the zenith of mankind and sin eater both, chosen to rule over creation by right of transcendence!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003640_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Himmlische Stimme-)Ich bin die Spitze der Schöpfung! Ich bin der auserwählte Herrscher über Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger und alles Leben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003650_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)My very existence is virtuous! I am perfect! <var 1A 02 /var>Immaculate<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003650_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Himmlische Stimme-)Ich bin ohne Schuld, frei von jedem Makel! Ich bin Innozenz!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003660_YSHTOLA<tab>He seems disinclined to grant us an audience.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003660_YSHTOLA<tab>Das soll wohl bedeuten, wir bekommen so schnell keine Audienz.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Find Vauthry. We will hold the eaters here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Um die kümmern wir uns. Hol du dir den Licht<var 16 /var>bringer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Come! Let's finish this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Los, macht sie fertig!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003690_VAUTHRY<tab>Why? Why am <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> cast down...when it is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who are the villains?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003690_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Innozenz-)Es kann nicht sein<var 1D /var>... Es darf nicht sein<var 1D /var>... Ihr <var 1A 02 /var>könnt<var 1A 01 /var> nicht im Recht sein!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003700_VAUTHRY<tab>Father told me...that I am hope. I am righteousness. That I am...a <var 1A 02 /var>god<var 1A 01 /var>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003700_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Innozenz-)Mein Vater hat es mir doch gesagt. Dass ich der Einzig Echte bin. Auserwählt, um als Gott zu herrschen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003710_VAUTHRY<tab>That is why I was born...as man and sin eater both...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003710_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Innozenz-)Deshalb wurde ich so geboren<var 1D /var>... halb Mann, halb Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003720_VAUTHRY<tab>I kept the people safe! They respected me! Worshipped me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003720_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Innozenz-)Sie haben mich doch gepriesen. Sie haben mich verehrt, weil ich sie beschützte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003730_VAUTHRY<tab>How can this be? I should be the one...looking down at you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003730_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Innozenz-)Es ist nicht richtig! Es ist nicht gerecht! <var 1A 02 /var>Ich<var 1A 01 /var> sollte auf <var 1A 02 /var>euch<var 1A 01 /var> herabblicken<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003740_VAUTHRY<tab>Help me, damn you... I...am your god...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003740_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Innozenz-)Hilf mir<var 1D /var>... Ich bin doch<var 1D /var>... ein Gott!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Look! The sky!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Seht, der Himmel!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003760_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Fools! Were it not for my decisive action, the whole city would have been overrun! Razed to the ground!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003760_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Undankbare Idioten<var 1D /var>... Ohne mich wäre die ganze Stadt überrannt worden!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003770_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Yet they dare to complain about casualties? Spare me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003770_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Und sie haben nichts Besseres zu tun, als sich über die Opfer zu beklagen! Die spinnen doch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003780_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>I'll wager they were put up to it by those wretches who seek to usurp me. They're stirring up the citizenry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003780_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Man hat sie aufgewiegelt. Da will mir jemand die Herrschaft streitig machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003790_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>But if they think I will yield to the likes of them, they are gravely mistaken!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003790_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Ha, die haben sich aber geschnitten. Ich werde niemals meinen Posten räumen! Niemals!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003800_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)To be subjected to such deplorable treatment... Such ingratitude! You have my sympathies, sir. You do so much good for this city, and you could do so much more, were you not surrounded by fools...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003800_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)Die Undankbarkeit ist wirklich nicht zu ertragen. Nach allem, was Ihr für diese Stadt getan habt, hättet Ihr mehr Respekt verdient.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003810_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Who are you!? You're not supposed to be in here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003810_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Wer bist du? Woher kommst du? Hier hat niemand Zutritt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003820_EMETSELCH<tab>My apologies for the intrusion, but I come bearing a proposal. One that will ensure the longevity of your reign.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003820_EMETSELCH<tab>Bitte entschuldigt mein unerlaubtes Eindringen. Ich bin bloß hier, um Euch zu helfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003830_EMETSELCH<tab>But give me the word, sir, and I will bring hither a Lightwarden.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003830_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich habe ein Angebot zu machen: Wenn Ihr es so wünscht, werde ich einen Licht<var 16 /var>bringer fangen und zu Euch bringen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003840_EMETSELCH<tab>By giving its power to the babe within your lady wife's womb, we shall create a transcendent being─a king to rule over all. And as sire to the king, your authority will never again be in question.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003840_EMETSELCH<tab>Er wird das Kind im Leib Eurer Frau zu einem mächtigen König machen. Und als Vater dieses übermächtigen Herrschers wird Euch niemand mehr infrage stellen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003850_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Haha! Amazing! Before my Vauthry, they behave as docile pets!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003850_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Wundervoll! Die Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger gehorchen meinem kleinen Vauthry wie Schoßhunde!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003860_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>With this gift, my line shall be guaranteed power for perpetuity! We shall rule the whole world!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003860_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Mit ihm wird unsere Familie die Macht und Ehre erlangen, die uns zusteht. Bald schon werden wir über die ganze Welt herrschen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003870_EMETSELCH<tab>By all means, sir. United under Eulmore's banner, men will cease fighting and abandon their ambitions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003870_EMETSELCH<tab>Ganz recht. Dann werden die Kämpfe enden, jegliches Aufbegehren nach Wandel wird vergessen und die Welt in einen willkommenen Stillstand verfallen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003880_EMETSELCH<tab>Thus they will grow fat and complacent, and in their sloth seal your supremacy...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003880_EMETSELCH<tab>Dein Volk wird fett und zufrieden sein, und niemand wird aufbegehren. Niemand wird die Ordnung stören.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003890_ALISAIE<tab>Are you all right!? S-Say something!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003890_ALISAIE<tab>Was ist mit dir? Sag doch was!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003900_YSHTOLA<tab>Twelve forfend, he cannot contain the Light. He's beginning to turn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003900_YSHTOLA<tab>Es war zu viel. Wenn wir nicht schnell was unternehmen, verwandelt er sich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003910_YSHTOLA<tab>Twelve forfend, she cannot contain the Light. She's beginning to turn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003910_YSHTOLA<tab>Es war zu viel. Wenn wir nicht schnell was unternehmen, verwandelt sie sich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003920_YSHTOLA<tab>Urianger! If you've aught up your sleeve, now is the time!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003920_YSHTOLA<tab>Urianger. Tu etwas!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003930_RYNE<tab>It's changing back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003930_RYNE<tab>Ha! Der Himmel wird wieder hell!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The combined power of every Lightwarden is too terrible a burden for any one soul to bear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Der Moment ist gekommen. Die Kraft aller Licht<var 16 /var>bringer befindet sich an einem Punkt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And so I shall relieve you of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Jetzt werde ich sie aufnehmen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003960_ALISAIE<tab>Exarch!? What are you doing!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003960_ALISAIE<tab>Um der Himmel Willen! Was machst du da?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I will channel this profusion of power to the Crystal Tower and use it to travel to other worlds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich<var 1D /var>... werde die Kraft von hier in den Kristallturm leiten und in eine andere Welt reisen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As I have dreamed of doing ever since I first learned of their existence!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Seit ich von der Existenz anderer Welten erfuhr, habe ich von diesem Moment geträumt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Who would choose to remain here, in this dying realm, when they might go elsewhere and begin anew? Not I. And thus...thus did I <var 1A 02 /var>use<var 1A 01 /var> you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Wer würde schon freiwillig in dieser sterbenden Welt bleiben? Ich jedenfalls nicht! Deshalb hab ich euch benutzt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004000_RYNE<tab>No... No, I don't believe you! It doesn't make sense!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004000_RYNE<tab>Lügner! Ich glaube dir kein Wort!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004010_ALISAIE<tab>Damn you! We won't let you do with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> as you please!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004010_ALISAIE<tab>Betrüger! Wir lassen nicht zu, dass du so mit <var 08 E905 ((ihr)) ((ihm)) /var> umspringst!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004020_URIANGER<tab>Do not interfere!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004020_URIANGER<tab>Nein! Lasst ihn!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004030_URIANGER<tab>Please! I beseech you all! <var 1A 02 /var>Let him go<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004030_URIANGER<tab>Bitte, ich beschwöre euch. Lasst ihn gewähren!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004040_YSHTOLA<tab>You knew of this, Urianger.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004040_YSHTOLA<tab>Urianger. Du hast das alles gewusst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004050_YSHTOLA<tab>'Tis all a fiction. Such vaguely defined acts of teleportation stand no chance of success.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004050_YSHTOLA<tab>Aber was er sagt, ist unmöglich. Ein Teleport dieser Art ist schier undenkbar.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004060_YSHTOLA<tab>The Exarch will never live to see another world─as he knows only too well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004060_YSHTOLA<tab>Der Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch wird niemals eine andere Welt erreichen, und er weiß es.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then...what does he mean to do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Was hat er dann vor?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004080_YSHTOLA<tab>He means to take the Light with him into the rift...where he will die.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004080_YSHTOLA<tab>Er will das ganze Licht in sich aufnehmen und in den Riss zwischen den Welten bringen<var 1D /var>... Wo er sterben wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004090_YSHTOLA<tab>He means to take the Light with him into the rift...where he will die.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004090_YSHTOLA<tab>Er will das ganze Licht in sich aufnehmen und in den Riss zwischen den Welten bringen<var 1D /var>... Wo er sterben wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004100_YSHTOLA<tab>From the beginning, he intended to sacrifice himself to save our friend and Norvrandt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004100_YSHTOLA<tab>Er hatte von Anfang an vor, sich selbst zu opfern, um <var 08 E905 ((unsere Heldin)) ((unseren Helden)) /var> und Norvrandt zu retten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>At journey's end, an opportunistic thief makes off with the hero's prize.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So wird <var 08 E905 ((die glorreiche Heldin ihrer)) ((der glorreiche Held seiner)) /var> Beute beraubt, von einem einfachen Dieb.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>A paltry way to end a chapter, I concede.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ein etwas abgedroschenes Ende, das gebe ich zu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Yet your tale will continue, and my role in it will scarcely be remembered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Aber die Geschichte hat noch einen Epilog. Welche Rolle ich darin spiele, daran wird sich schon bald niemand mehr erinnern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Worry not. Whatever should become of me, I will be happy and free, safe in the knowledge that I have played my part.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sorg dich nicht um einen namenlosen Kristall<var 16 /var>exarchen. Mir reicht das Wissen, dass mein Wunsch in Erfüllung ging.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wie reagierst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Remain silent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Schweigen

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Call him by his name.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Seinen Namen rufen

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank you for fighting for this world. For believing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Danke, dass du an mich geglaubt und für diese Welt gekämpft hast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Fare you well, my friend─my inspiration.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Leb wohl, <var 08 E905 ((meine Heldin)) ((mein Held)) /var>. Mein großes Vorbild.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank you for fighting for this world. For believing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Danke, dass du an mich geglaubt und für diese Welt gekämpft hast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004180_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Fare you well, my friend─my inspiration.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004180_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Leb wohl, <var 08 E905 ((meine Heldin)) ((mein Held)) /var>. Mein großes Vorbild.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004190_EMETSELCH<tab>Only those who possess the Royal Eye of the Allagan imperial line are capable of controlling the Crystal Tower. Such individuals do not exist in the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004190_EMETSELCH<tab>Der Kristallturm kann nur von jemandem mit dem roten Auge des allagischen Kaisergeschlechts gesteuert werden. Doch davon existiert auf der ersten Splitter<var 16 /var>welt niemand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004200_EMETSELCH<tab>Therefore, in all likelihood, the Exarch arrived here with the tower. This much I had surmised, yet I could not discern his grand scheme.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004200_EMETSELCH<tab>Deshalb war klar, dass der Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch zusammen mit dem Turm hierher gelangt sein musste, über Raum und Zeit hinweg, doch was er vorhatte, war mir ein Rätsel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004210_EMETSELCH<tab>To think that he went through all this trouble for the sake of a single hero. It's almost admirable in its absurdity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004210_EMETSELCH<tab>Wie hätte man auch darauf kommen können, dass er all das auf sich nimmt, bloß um <var 08 E905 ((eine Heldin)) ((einen Helden)) /var> zu retten. Das ist so verrückt, dass ich es schon wieder bewundernswert finde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004220_EMETSELCH<tab>Alas, it is not your grand scheme that will succeed, but ours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004220_EMETSELCH<tab>Doch es ist nicht dein Plan, der aufgeht, sondern unserer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004230_THANCRED<tab>You bastard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004230_THANCRED<tab>Du Wahnsinniger!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004240_EMETSELCH<tab>Stay put. Your friend is still alive, but whether he remains so depends on you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004240_EMETSELCH<tab>Vorsicht, haltet besser still! Der Exarch lebt noch<var 1D /var>- aber wie lange noch, hängt von euch ab.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004250_EMETSELCH<tab>What a disappointment you turned out to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004250_EMETSELCH<tab>Von dir bin ich wirklich sehr enttäuscht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004260_EMETSELCH<tab>I placed my faith in you. Let myself believe that you could contain the Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004260_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich dachte, du wärst stark genug für all das Licht. Doch sieh dich an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004270_EMETSELCH<tab>But look at you now, halfway to becoming a monster. You are unworthy of my patronage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004270_EMETSELCH<tab>Bald wirst du dich in ein Monstrum verwandelt haben, und was soll ich dann noch mit dir anfangen? Letztendlich bist du eben doch nur ein unvoll<var 16 /var>kommen<var 16 /var>er Wurm, wie all die anderen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What do you intend to do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was bei allen Höllen hast du vor?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It was you who created Vauthry, wasn't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Du hast Vauthry geschaffen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004280_EMETSELCH<tab>(SIGH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004280_EMETSELCH<tab>Hach ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004290_EMETSELCH<tab>I am an Ascian. My heart's sole desire is to usher in the Great Rejoining.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004290_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich bin ein Ascian. Mein Ziel ist die Vereinigung aller Welten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004300_EMETSELCH<tab>A hundred years ago, I entrusted my comrade Loghrif with the task of increasing Light's sway over this world. This we sought to do by manipulating heroes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004300_EMETSELCH<tab>Vor einhundert Jahren gab ich meinem Bruder Loghrif den Auftrag, den Einfluss des Lichts im ersten Splitter zu stärken. Zu diesem Zweck betrog er die Helden dieser Welt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004310_EMETSELCH<tab>When that failed to achieve the desired result, I created Vauthry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004310_EMETSELCH<tab>Als das nicht zum erwünschten Erfolg führte, erschuf ich Vauthry.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004320_EMETSELCH<tab>But thanks to your meddling, that too has ended in failure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004320_EMETSELCH<tab>Doch aufgrund eurer überaus lästigen Einmischung hat auch er sein Ziel verfehlt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004330_ALPHINAUD<tab>What was your true purpose in approaching us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Was wolltest du wirklich von uns?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004340_EMETSELCH<tab>By your Twelve, boy, have I not told you before that everything I said was the truth?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004340_EMETSELCH<tab>Ist das immer noch nicht klar? Alles, was ich gesagt habe, entspricht der Wahrheit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004350_EMETSELCH<tab>You were specimens by which I might gauge man's potential as it stands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004350_EMETSELCH<tab>Es war eine Probe. Ich wollte sehen, über welches Potenzial eure unvollkommene Art verfügt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004360_EMETSELCH<tab>I genuinely had an interest in you. Genuinely considered taking you on as allies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004360_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich habe mich aufrichtig für euch interessiert. Ich zog ernsthaft in Erwägung, mich mit euch zu verbünden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004370_EMETSELCH<tab>Provided <var 1A 02 /var><var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var><var 1A 01 /var> could contain and control the Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004370_EMETSELCH<tab>Die Voraussetzung dafür war allerdings, dass <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var> das Licht in sich aufnehmen und bändigen könnte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004380_EMETSELCH<tab>If not then <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>─and by extension you─would be of no use to me. 'Twas as simple as that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004380_EMETSELCH<tab>Doch offensichtlich ist <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var> dazu nicht in der Lage. So hat <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var><var 1D /var>- und damit auch eure Art<var 1D /var>- keinen Wert für mich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004390_THANCRED<tab>So we've been found wanting. How disheartening.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004390_THANCRED<tab>Dass wir nicht deinen Idealen entsprechen, nehme ich als Kompliment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004400_THANCRED<tab>But even had we fulfilled your conditions, there was no guarantee that we would cooperate. What then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004400_THANCRED<tab>Aber was, wenn wir deine Probe bestanden und nicht mit dir zusammengearbeitet hätten? Was wäre dann gewesen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004410_EMETSELCH<tab>Then I simply kill you all. At the very least, it would restore the world to the way it was before you went about trouncing Lightwardens willy-nilly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004410_EMETSELCH<tab>Dann hätte ich euch alle getötet und das Licht freigesetzt. Dann wäre die Welt zumindest wieder in dem Zustand, in dem sie vor eurer Jagd auf die Licht<var 16 /var>bringer war.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004420_EMETSELCH<tab>Suffice it to say it would be most inconvenient to have all that Light taken away─and I would be lying if I were to claim his actions didn't have me worried.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004420_EMETSELCH<tab>Es wäre wirklich sehr ärgerlich gewesen, wenn das ganze mühsam angesammelte Licht einfach so verschwunden wäre. Deshalb hat er mir durchaus etwas Kopfzerbrechen bereitet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004430_EMETSELCH<tab>Hm, you still retain your form and your senses...but you have all but become a sin eater.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004430_EMETSELCH<tab>Hm<var 1D /var>... Du verfügst noch über deine Sinne und deine Gestalt, aber im Inneren bist du schon weitgehend ein Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004440_EMETSELCH<tab>Whether you will it or no, your mere existence will serve to engulf the world in Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004440_EMETSELCH<tab>Ob du es willst oder nicht, du wirst den Rest dieser Welt mit Licht überfluten. Allein mit deiner Anwesenheit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004450_EMETSELCH<tab>Those in your company will likewise turn into sin eaters, and in time you will succumb to your base instincts and hunt innocents to feast on their sweet, sweet aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004450_EMETSELCH<tab>Jeder, der sich mit dir abgibt, wird selbst zum Sünden<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>tilger, und bald schon stürzt ihr euch auf wehrlose Seelen, um ihren unwiderstehlichen Äther zu kosten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004460_EMETSELCH<tab>Those few with the will left to fight may rise up against you. But before your absolute might, they will quickly know despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004460_EMETSELCH<tab>Bestimmt werden sich wieder ein paar Lebensmüde in deinen Weg stellen, doch angesichts deiner Kraft werden sie alle niedergehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004470_EMETSELCH<tab>"There is no hope! We are finished! <var 1A 02 /var>Mankind<var 1A 01 /var> is finished!“
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004470_EMETSELCH<tab>„Hilfe, wir sind verloren.“ „Es gibt keine Hoffnung mehr.“ Ich kann sie schon hören.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004480_EMETSELCH<tab>Ahhh, the irony. What Vauthry achieved through bliss, you will achieve through despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004480_EMETSELCH<tab>Es ist perfekt. Den Stillstand, den Vauthry durch Glückseligkeit erreichen wollte, wirst du durch Ver<var 16 /var>zweif<var 16 /var>lung herbeiführen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004490_EMETSELCH<tab>But I have overstayed my welcome. I shall look forward to seeing you bring the world to its knees, hero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004490_EMETSELCH<tab>Damit ist alles gesagt. Ich werde mich nun verabschieden. Viel Erfolg noch bei der Vernichtung dieser Welt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Exarch!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nein! Kristall<var 16 /var>exarch!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004510_EMETSELCH<tab>I have naught to show for all the time and effort I invested in you. He is a small token for my troubles.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004510_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich nehme ihn als Entschädigung für die Hilfe, die ich euch nutzloserweise gewährte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004520_EMETSELCH<tab>I did not expect that I could learn aught from man, but I may yet learn something from all the knowledge he had hoarded for his precious hero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004520_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass ich von einem Unvollkommenen jemals etwas lernen könnte, aber sein Wissen könnte sich noch als hilfreich erweisen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004530_EMETSELCH<tab>I pity you, I do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004530_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich habe wirklich Mitleid mit dir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004540_EMETSELCH<tab>Your friends are now your foes. If you do not kill them, they will kill you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004540_EMETSELCH<tab>Deine Freunde werden schon bald deine Feinde sein. Entweder du tötest sie oder sie töten dich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004550_EMETSELCH<tab>When it all becomes too much to bear, seek me out at my abode, in the dark depths of the Tempest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004550_EMETSELCH<tab>Nutze deinen allerletzten Funken Verstand und komm zu mir, wenn es so weit ist. Ich werde deinem Elend gerne ein Ende bereiten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004560_EMETSELCH<tab>There, you may complete your descent into madness with some dignity, far from prying eyes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004560_EMETSELCH<tab>Du findest mich tief unter den stürmischen Wogen der schwärzesten See.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004570_EMETSELCH<tab>Till then, I bid you farewell...eater.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004570_EMETSELCH<tab>Ich wünsche dir guten Appetit<var 1D /var>... Vertilger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004580_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ah. Finally.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004580_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ah, du bist wach.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was it just a dream?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>War das alles ein Traum?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What happened?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was ist passiert, nachdem ich ohnmächtig wurde?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004590_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You're confused, and small wonder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004590_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Leider nicht. Aber es ist kein Wunder, dass es dir so vorkommt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004600_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>After you collapsed, Emet-Selch vanished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004600_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Nachdem du das Bewusstsein verloren hattest, verschwand Emet-Selch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004610_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Then Ryne did what she could to stay the raging of the Light within your body.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004610_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ryne tat alles, was sie konnte, um das Licht in deinem Inneren zu bändigen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004620_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Thanks to her, you're still you, but she's only delayed the inevitable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004620_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Es gelang ihr, den Verwandlungsprozess fürs Erste zu unterbinden, aber<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004630_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You're not going to like what you see, but you still need to see it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004630_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Sieh selbst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004640_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It's like this all over. The whole of Norvrandt is shrouded in Light again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004640_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Kholusia, Rak'tika, Amh Araeng, Il Mheg<var 1D /var>... Ganz Norvrandt ist wieder vom Licht bedeckt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004650_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>And it's because of you and the power you absorbed from the Wardens.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004650_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Es ist das Licht, das du in dir hast. Du strahlst es aus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004660_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>No one knows but your friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004660_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Bisher wissen nur deine Freunde, dass es von dir ausgeht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004670_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>When they carried you down from the mountain, they told everyone waiting below that they didn't understand why the Light had returned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004670_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Sie trugen dich den Berg hinunter und erzählten den Wartenden, dass sie nicht wüssten, warum das Licht zurückgekehrt ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004680_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>And now they're out there trying to allay the people's fears while searching for a way to save you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004680_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Sie reisen jetzt durch Norvrandt, um die Bevölkerung zu beruhigen und vielleicht einen Weg zu finden, dich zu retten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004690_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>If you're well enough to be up, you're well enough to get some fresh air. Better that than stewing in here. Go on. Go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004690_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Geh raus, wenn du dich kräftig genug fühlst. Es ist besser, als hier dem Gram nachzuhängen. Geh, es wird dir guttun.
